localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
blogPost.body: Meetings won't feel like they go on forever anymore. Zoom Agenda lets you create an agenda and add a timer to every agenda item so you know how long to spend discussing about each item.
blogPost.title: Zoom Agenda Timer - Create a timer for your agenda items on Zoom.
blogPost.author: Danielle Song

localize.description: 会议不会再有永远进行下去的感觉。Zoom Agenda可以让您创建一个议程，并为每个议程项目添加一个计时器，这样您就可以知道每个项目的讨论时间。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上为您的议程项目创建一个定时器。

localize.description: 會議不會再有永遠進行下去的感覺。Zoom Agenda可以讓您創建一個議程，併爲每個議程項目添加一個計時器，這樣您就可以知道每個項目的討論時間。
localize.tagline: 在Zoom上爲您的議程項目創建一個定時器。

previous.excerpt: Each roll comes with a physical display, so you can hang your NFTP in your bathroom alongside your IRL rolls. All proceeds will be donated to Direct Relief, to improve the lives of people impacted by poverty or emergency situations around the world.
previous.title: Charmin NFTP - The world's first non-fungible toilet paper

localize.description: 每一卷都有实物展示，所以你可以把你的NFTP和你的IRL卷挂在浴室里。所有收益将捐给直接救济组织，用于改善世界各地受贫困或紧急情况影响的人们的生活。
localize.tagline: 世界上第一款非菌性卫生纸

localize.description: 每一卷都有實物展示，所以你可以把你的NFTP和你的IRL卷掛在浴室裏。所有收益將捐給直接救濟組織，用於改善世界各地受貧困或緊急情況影響的人們的生活。
localize.tagline: 世界上第一款非菌性衛生紙
